overview:
Paul Redfern is an Entrepreneurial Accountant; he focuses his Certified Public Accounting practice on partnering with growing businesses, start-ups and entrepreneurs. Through this work, he joined Fusion Monarch as Chief Financial Officer of Rule.fm.

Prior to becoming a public accountant, Paul was the Chief Financial Officer of a successful, web hosting company. As a CPA, he has obtained significant experience performing audits and consulting services, prior to launching his own, specialized firm in 2007.

Paul Redfern is also an award-winning speaker. He has spoken to diverse groups on a range of topics, such as the fundamentals of starting a business, establishing a SMART business plan, business taxes as well as a number of humorous speeches. He has won accolades for his ability to make technical business topics entertaining and engaging.

Paul is a regular speaker at Small Business Development Center of North San Diego County (www.sandiegosmallbiz.com), teaches accounting for non-accountants at a local college and serves as board member to two organizations.
